text: 1.13-14 2 Ko 5.12, Plp 2.16 Pen mɨj nɨbop tɨkɨpul okok, takaw bak okok tek agɨl ma tɨkɨpul. Mɨj tɨkɨpul okok, mɨj pi ak nɨgɨlɨg agñɨl, mɨseŋ yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkɨpul. Nɨŋɨd apun, takaw tɨkɨpul ogɨnap nɨgtep ma gɨpɨm. Yad pen gos anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Bɨawl chɨn Jisas adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, chɨl nɨbop nɨgol tep gɨnɨgab tek, nɨbi pen chɨlop nɨgem tep gɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak mɨj tɨkɨpul takaw ak mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨl mɨseŋ nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agɨl gos nopun.
